alert.note: Alert for Duval; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Duval and southeastern Webb Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of Ranchitos Las Lomas, or 27 miles southwest of Freer, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aguilares, Ranchitos Las Lomas and Mirando City. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 778 and 808. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
